mapper.select: select review_no as reviewNo, class_no as classNo, product_no as productNo, member_no as memberNo, review_content as reviewContent, review_rate as reviewRate, review_flag as reviewFlag, review_date as reviewDate from review where class_no=#{classNo}
select nvl(trunc(avg(review_rate), 1), 0) from review where class_no=#{classNo}
